japanese:
うっえすっぎさーん！
今日はフルーツのスープですよ！
translation:
UESUGI-SAAAN!
Today's meal is fruit soup!

japanese:
なかなか手を出さない料理だけど、
食材が限られているからこその挑戦ってところね。
translation:
That's a dish that I don't get my hands on very often.
It's a challenge,
because the ingredients are very limited.

japanese:
では、実食です！　いただきまーす！
んっ……。
translation:
Alright, I'll see what it's about! Time to eaaat!
Mm...

japanese:
甘いです！
くだものだけでこんなに甘くなるんですね！
translation:
It's sweet!
It can get THIS sweet, just with fruit, huh!

japanese:
色々なくだものが入ってて最高ね。
それぞれのいいところが充分に引き出されてるわ。
translation:
Only the best fruit soups use
many kinds of different fruits.
The best part of each one is really brought out.
